original_text: His tail swept down a third of the stars of heaven and cast them to the earth. And the dragon stood before the woman who was about to give birth, so that when she bore her child he might devour it.
korean_text: 그 꼬리가 하늘의 별 삼분의 일을 끌어다가 땅에 던지더라 용이 해산하려는 여자 앞에서 그가 해산하면 그 아이를 삼키고자 하더니

sentences.original_text: His tail swept down a third of the stars of heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그 꼬리가 하늘의 별 삼분의 일을 쓸어내렸습니다

sentences.original_text: and cast them to the earth.
And the dragon stood before the woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 용은 그 여자 앞에 섰습니다

sentences.original_text: who was about to give birth,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여자는 곧 아기를 낳을 참이었습니다

sentences.original_text: so that when she bore her child
